account.desc: Manage how information is displayed on your account.
address.create.headline: New Address
address.create.desc: Add a new address here to associate it with your account
address.create.safety: All the personal data associated to your account is safely stored in our database, and we will not share it with third parties.
address.update.headline: Update Address
address.desc: Here you can add different delivery addresses for your account
account.security.warning: Be careful when using this setting
profile.desc: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
password.reset.headline: Reset your password
password.reset.desc: Fill the fields below to complete your password reset
orders.desc: Check the status of recent orders, manage returns, and download invoices.
